§ 7441. Faculty and other officers: leaves of absence The Superintendent of the Academy may grant a leave of absence for the period of the suspension of the ordinary academic studies, without deduction of pay or allowances, to a professor, assistant professor, instructor, or other officer of the Academy. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 240, § 4341; renumbered § 7441, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 808(c)(1), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1839.)
